titleStmt.title: Some helpes to stirre up to Christian duties Wherein is explained the nature of the dnty [sic] of stirring vp ourselves. Instances are given in the most necessary Christian duties. Some questions about this subiect are profitably resolved. By Henry Whitfeld B D. preacher of Gods word, at Ockley in Surrey
Some helpes to stir up to Christian duties.
titleStmt.author: Whitfield, Henry, 1597-1660?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Gilt Cup in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Whitfield, Henry. Some helpes to stir up to Christian duties.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
